<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Viking Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2094) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 198 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Viking](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=81)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

Vikings spend long periods of time at sea, only to leap from their boats at a moment's notice, charge through the surf, and take their enemies by storm. You're trained in [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8). When moving through water using your land Speed, you ignore difficult terrain resulting from shallow water, such as in bogs or on beaches. In addition, if you roll a success for your [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39), you get a critical success instead.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the viking archetype.

<title level="2">Viking Dedication leads to...</title>
[Hurling Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2095), [Second Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=2098), [Viking Vindicator](/Feats.aspx?ID=3619), [Viking Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2096)
name: Viking Dedication
